summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackInfused with hyaluronic acid and lactic acid, Dermalogica's Intensive Moisture Balance Moisturizer intensively moisturizes dry skin and increases cell turnover to slow the signs of aging.
details: DetailsBenefitsIntensely moisturizes dry, depleted skinThis formula locks in hydration, enhances moisture content, improves firmness, and reduces the appearance of fine linesRestores balance to dry skin to give a clean, healthy appearanceSuggested for those concerned with fines line and wrinkles, dryness, dullness and uneven skin textureKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: hydrates the skinBioReplenish Complex: enhances skin's natural resilience and barrierLactic Acid: hydrates and exfoliates the skinPrebiotic Chlorella Algae Complex: helps rebalance the skin's natural microbiome for healthy-looking skinAloe Vera: soothes the skinResearch ResultsClinically proven to deliver nourishment in the skin 10 layers deepItem 2535727How To UseAfter cleansing and toning, apply over face and neck in light, upward strokes. Use twice daily, morning and night.IngredientsWater, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Butylene Glycol, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Cetyl Caprylate, Stearic Acid, PEG-8, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate SE, PEG-100 Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Ceramide NP, Phytosterols, Centella Asiatica Extract, Linoleic Acid, Echinacea Purpurea Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Palmitic Acid, Myristic Acid, Rosa Centifolia Flotheyr Extract, Lactic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Propanediol, Tocopherol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflotheyr) Seed Oil, TetrasodiumGlutamate Diacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Hydroxystearic Acid, Aminomethyl Propanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply over face and neck in light, upward strokes. Use twice daily, morning and night.

reviews.headline: Acne
reviews.comments: I purchased this product thinking it would be a good moisturizer,. I was hesitant to use it because it has a chemical smell, my dry skin improved immediately but I am left with large cystic looking acne on my face. What a huge waste of my hard earned money

reviews.headline: SO HAPPY
reviews.comments: I gave this a try and I am so thrilled.  It is wonderful!   I am hooked with its level of moisture.  Others have be sitting on the surface but this one actually soaks into my skin and I can not say enough good things.

reviews.headline: STRONG chemical smell
reviews.comments: I have sensitive irrirated skin and while this moisturizer keeps my skin soft and hydrated, it smells disgusting. It has a very strong chemical odor. It also burns slightly on my skin. The product is expensive, and it's supposed to be made of quality ingredients; this is frustrating to say the least. Especially since so many people recommend this brand.

reviews.headline: Nah
reviews.comments: I was so hopeful for this with my dry skin. Sadly, it leaves me so greasy and shiny. The chemical smell is awful.

reviews.headline: Yes, I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I have used this product for more than 20 years. And I love it. I wish they would start reproducing their other excellent product, Intensive Eye Repair

reviews.headline: Everytime I try to break up with Dermalogica
reviews.comments: I come running back once I start using actives! Worth the money on a per ounce basis when compared to many drug store brands and consistently works well with my skin, especially when on retinol. And I love that they have two other weights of moisturizers for when I'm not testing my skin barriers last nerve!

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: Lovr this stuff. Loggteright but actually moisturizes. Would buy again

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: It is easy to use.  A little goes a long way, so you don't have to use a lot.  It makes my face feel good, not greasy or tight.

reviews.headline: My Go To Moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I've used this moisturizer for years.  I'm 65+ and this really hydrates and rejuvenates so well!  I love this product.

reviews.headline: Smelly, no SPF. Ok for night
reviews.comments: I was trying to upgrade my skincare routine with a daytime product that could also serve as a face sunscreen. Since I was already using Dermalogica eye cream, it made sense to look at their other products. I don't know how I ended up with this. Not what I expected and certainly not worth what I paid. I guess I'll use it as a night cream.

reviews.headline: Yes, I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love this product of Dermalogica. I used Intensive Eye repair for more than 20 years. But sadly, they discontinued it. I used all of other Dermalogica eye creams and liked NONE of them. I wish they reproduce Intensive Eye repair soon.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer
reviews.comments: Very quenching moisturizer. My face drinks in the product. I feel and look refreshed when I wake up. When I do not use it I can tell. I like that I can by it in different sizes, which is economical.  So good, cannot say enough about it! I recommend buying the whole series.

reviews.headline: Not moisturizing enough for mature, dry skin
reviews.comments: I'd hoped to use this as a night cream, but it didnt deliver enough hydration over night. I'm 45, with dry skin and live in a dry climate. This one felt nice upon application, but I wake up feeling tight and needing more moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love
reviews.comments: I've loved Dermologica for at least 20 years & absolutely love love love this larger size!! Lasts sooooooo long!!

reviews.headline: I tried them all
reviews.comments: So I love the Dermalogica line of skincare.  I am 45 and have combination skin.  I have tried the whole line to find my perfect skin care routine.  I use this moisturizer on nights my skin needs more TLC.  My other go-to is the skin cocoon.

reviews.headline: All day moisture
reviews.comments: I work long shifts and this keeps my face moisturized all day. This is my fall/winter go to. Or if the elements stressed my face it hydrates and moisturizes.

reviews.headline: Dermalogica
reviews.comments: Love this  product.   I've been using  it for years!

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: This moisturizer feels so good on my skin.  Clean, fresh fragrance and really works well on my skin.  Highly recommend

reviews.headline: The best product
reviews.comments: The best

reviews.headline: Great cream for older woman
reviews.comments: Love this product!

faceoff_positive.comments: One day I made the brave decision to actually invest my money in good skincare products. After spending days upon days of researching great skin care products that are affordable, Dermalogica came to my rescue. I was done and tired of emptying out my wallet so many times for continuous drugstore products that never work.I have severely dry skin, also which is oily at times, and is prone to breakouts as well. I first bought the beginners kit for dry skin, which worked very well for my skin. I did notice a difference in the look, texture, and clearity in my skin after a couple of weeks. What I mostly needed out of this kit was the moisturizer, as said before I have very dry skin so it is completely vital I use it morning and night. I've tried many moisturizers before this product, and yes they did moisturize my face, but that's it. They weren't long-lasting at all. The Intensive Moisture Balance is such a great product. It's more than a moisturizer to me. To put into words it's like my "bodyguard" for my skin. Whenever my skin is dry or very oily, I cleanse my face and put some of this moisture on, it does wonders. My skin never feels like a desert and most importantly is not oily or greasy. I can wear it under my makeup, mix it in with my foundation (as a tinted moisturizer) and I no longer have worries. Another great thing also is that a little, tiny amount goes a long way and it will last all day and not wear off. I totally recommend this product to anyone looking for a great moisturizer. I know everyone's skin is different, but it's worth a shot. Thanks Dermalogica!
faceoff_positive.headline: Sums up just what I need!

faceoff_negative.comments: LOVED the older version of this lotion...very nourishing and pampering...then it seemed to get watery and less moisturizing. Still a good lotion but if I wanted a lighter lotion I would order one...now there doesn't seem to be a truly "intensive moisturizing" one on the dermalogica line...hope they will change back to their old formula!
faceoff_negative.headline: Old formula was better
